DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : OTHER NEWS
DOC.TEXT: USAir Group Inc. ' s customer service employees rejected union representation amid company efforts to reduce labor costs by about $ 500 million annually . . . . Mercedes-Benz of North_America said U.S. prices of its 1995 models will be an average of 1.9 % lower than final 1994 model prices , on a sales-weighted basis .
